description: This refreshing Matcha Cloud cocktail is the perfect mix of sweet and sour flavors for a tantalizing drink. With its combination of matcha, lime juice, and honey syrup, it's sure to please! Try one today and treat yourself to an unforgettable experience.
name: Matcha Cloud

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients, apart from ice, in a shaker and dry shake for about 15 seconds.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients, apart from ice, in a shaker and dry shake for about 15 seconds.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice cubes and shake some more.
recipeInstructions.text: Add ice cubes and shake some more.

recipeInstructions.name: Place a few ice cubes into a brandy balloon glass and pour your cocktail over the ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Place a few ice cubes into a brandy balloon glass and pour your cocktail over the ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a sprinkling of matcha tea powder, and enjoy.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with a sprinkling of matcha tea powder, and enjoy.
